notifications.title: Monthly Meeting Announcement
notifications.content: Dear residents, please join us for the monthly dormitory meeting on January 15th at 6:30 PM in the common room. Important updates will be discussed.

notifications.title: Emergency Water Shutdown
notifications.content: Attention: Water supply will be temporarily shut down on January 8th from 10 AM to 2 PM for maintenance. Please plan accordingly.

notifications.title: Fire Drill Notification
notifications.content: There will be a fire drill conducted on January 10th at 11 AM. Please evacuate promptly when the alarm sounds.

notifications.title: New Laundry Room Rules
notifications.content: Starting January 5th, all residents must book laundry slots in advance using the dormitory app. No exceptions will be made.

notifications.title: Community Clean-Up Day
notifications.content: Join us on January 20th for a community clean-up day around the dormitory premises. Supplies will be provided. Let’s make a difference together!

notifications.title: Quiet Hours Reminder
notifications.content: Please remember that quiet hours are from 10 PM to 7 AM. Be considerate of your neighbors during these times. Thank you!

notifications.title: Winter Holiday Decorations
notifications.content: We invite all residents to help us decorate the common areas for the winter holidays on January 7th at 4 PM. Snacks will be provided!

notifications.title: Lost and Found Update
notifications.content: The lost and found box has been updated. Please check it in the reception area if you've misplaced any items recently.
